name: Motorcycle, tricycle, ATV hill racing
description:
Motorcycle, tricycle, ATV hill racing is en excellent opportunity for you to show your driving skills. Your task is to drive fast, but careful and overcome the different obstacles. Drive through the stone hills, ruined abandoned houses, go up and down on the stairs and much much more. With each level the game will become more and more difficult, so it will become more and more interesting.

If you are a fun of a dangerous racing, then Motorcycle, tricycle, ATV hill racing is exactly what you need. Each level has many dangerous obstacles: unpredictable barriers, explosive barrels, animals, broken cars and much more...

Choose your favorite driver and any motorcycle, tricycle or ATM you like and become the best driver ever! Race against your own ghost, learn on your mistakes and become the professional driver!

To make your driving more interested and exciting we placed the sexy girls on the each checkpoint, drive forward and meet all of them!

How to play :

+ Choose one of 28 motorcycles, 5 tricycles and 6 ATVs
+ Select one of 20 drivers
+ Drive forward, use the buttons to move the motorcycle.
+ If you died don't give up, start from the checkpoint and continue
+ Race against your own ghost

Features :

+20 Levels
+ Excellent design
+ Modern UI
